name: Tutti Frutti
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Shaun Southern - Mr. Chip Software / Mastertronic. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

You are super strawberry, King of the Orchard, in this fast moving all action arcade game. Your job is to collect 15 cherries and apples from the orchard, as they are now ripe and it's fruit picking time.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor keys
Push: A
Restart level: Select   

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow keys
Push: Z
Restart level: Shift     

Plus4World
